title: Contact Us - FlexPay
summary: FlexPay offers solutions for revenue and customer recovery, helping businesses reduce churn and increase revenue. The page provides contact options for sales inquiries, product support, and partnerships, along with a calculator to estimate potential revenue growth.
key_points: FlexPay's Invisible Recovery solution aims to increase revenue and active customer growth.
Contact options are available for sales, product support, and partnerships.
A calculator is provided to estimate potential revenue and customer growth.
The page highlights FlexPay's role in recovering failed payments and minimizing customer churn.
